Directions: In a mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar.  Add the eggs, one at a time, beating well after each.  Combine dry ingredients; add to creamed mixture and mix well.  Stir in apple and nuts.  Spread into a greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking pan.  Bake at 375 degrees F for 20-25 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.  Cool.  Dust with confectioners' sugar.  Cut into bars.
